# Table
<br />
<br />
<br />
```{r table, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warnings=FALSE, results='asis'}
library(dplyr)   
library(flextable)
library(officer)
library(knitr)
library(tibble)

data <- opd_daily_patient_selection()
data_area <- length(data)
data_date <- length(data[[1]][1,])
name_col <- names(data[[1]][1,])



for (A in 1:data_area) {
  header <- paste("\\Large Clinical Area",A,sep = " ")
  cat(header)
  for (D in 1:data_date) {
    table <- data.frame(data[[A]][,D]) %>% add_column(Description = "")
    colnames(table) <- c(name_col[D],"Description")
    cf <- flextable(table) %>% theme_box()  %>%   set_table_properties(layout = "fixed",width =1) %>% width(j = 1, 1.5) %>% width(j = 2, 5.5)
    cat(knit_print(cf))
    cat("\n\\newpage\n")
  }
}

```
